response.skills: Ingeniería, Gestión de proyectos, Inglés, Investigación, Capacidad de análisis, Diseño, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Análisis de datos

company.name: Inchcape Digital
company.description:
As an independent, multi-brand automotive distributor, Inchcape brings the best loved brands to customers in 36 countries throughout the world.

Listed on the London Stock Exchange since 1958, Inchcape has a proud history going back over 170 years. 

Inchcape employs over 15,000 team members globally and our Inchcape Digital team is the home of everyone in the company involved in the delivery of digital, technology, data, and cyber. 

Inchcape Digital is central to our strategy and we are investing to create industry-leading capabilities across data, digital, technology and cyber services and solutions.

We operate two new Digital Delivery Centres in The Philippines and Bogota, Colombia.

We have a hugely ambitious global programme of omni-channel and data analytics development and we are doing this with leading edge software and cloud infrastructure.

As a member of our team, your work will be central to the successful delivery of our strategy and the long-term success of our business. 

To support our growth we are now recruiting across the following areas:

•	Business Analytics & Automation
•	Network Security & Infrastructure
•	Omnichannel
•	SAP
•	Security
•	Service Management

View our website to explore our available roles.
